QVM: Quaternions, Vectors, Matrices

assign(quat,quat)

#include <boost/qvm/quat_operations.hpp>

namespace boost
{
    namespace qvm
    {
        //Only enabled if:
        //  is_quat<A>::value && is_quat<B>::value
        template <class A,class B>
        A & assign( A & a, B const & b );
    }
}

Effects:

Copies all elements of the quaternion b to the quaternion a.

Returns:

a.

See also: boost/qvm/quat_operations.hpp | convert_to(quat) | normalized(quat) | quat | set_identity(quat) | set_rot(quat,vec,scalar) | set_rotx(quat,scalar) | set_roty(quat,scalar) | set_rotz(quat,scalar) | set_zero(quat)
